## IMGUI.switchFocus() method

Attempts to switch focus to next, or if Shift is pressed, to previous component. This is meant be called ONLY from component key handlers.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
switchFocus(): void;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

`void`
